source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Society for Human Resources Management Cert® practice exams
items.headline: Pass the SHRM-CP® certification on the first attempt. 339 questions
objectives_summary: SHRM® certifications directly link to on-the-job scenarios and realistic work situations. Seventy-three percent of examinees say the SHRM-CP® exam is HR job-relevant.

items.title: Achieve Successful HR Technology With The 5 Pillar Framework
items.headline: World class employee solutions for self-service, case management, portals, knowledge management and talent acquisition
objectives_summary: The main capabilities you need to build and run for effective use of technology in HR that drives productivity and improves employee experience
Real examples from a world class case study of a large financial services firm in Africa that pioneered user friendly, mobile technology for its 40,000 employees
How an HR shared services function uses technology to effectively support the rest of the organisation in lifting HR to new heights of performance

items.title: Talent Management; How to Survive the War on Talent
items.headline: How to Survive the War on Talent
objectives_summary: Have a better understanding of the key elements that make up a successful talent management program.
Be able to implement a strong startegic talent management program.

You will have a better understanding of Recruiting, Employee Development, Identification of Key Positions, Talent Identification, Succession Planning, Performance Management, Workforce Planning, Critical Skills Analysis, Talent Review Process and Knowledge Transfer.

items.title: Recruitment, Selection and Onboarding

visible_instructors.job_title: HR consultant with over 15 years of work experience
visible_instructors.name: Rajiv

items.headline: This course will help you understand the key aspects of recruitment ,selection and onboarding of employees in a company
objectives_summary: You will learn the essential aspects of how to build a great Employee Value Preposition (EVP) for your company, how to attract the right employees through  well designed  Recruitment process,Select the right fit for the role from the prospective candidate  and onboard them in a smooth manner
